channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Hi guys, I have been running my own runescape private server last year succesfull without any trouble.
But now, since i got my new computer, and windows 7, and a router, i hardly managed to install JDK for my server. Now that i have got everything on a good line, i have one problem left.
At the end it says, on the webclient; Error connecting server.
I have tried adding the port 43594 to the windows firewall, and putting my virusscanner firewall off. But it doesnt help. Anyone know what the problem can be?

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @xhavefunx xhavefunx
item.description:

I have tried adding the port 43594 to the windows firewall, and putting my virusscanner firewall off. But it doesnt help.
